code: import{CLOSE_CART,OPEN_CART}from"../actions/actions";import{Types}from"../actions/types";var initialState={CartIsOpen:false};var CartReducer=function CartReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case Types.OPEN_CART:return{CartIsOpen:true};case Types.CLOSE_CART:return{CartIsOpen:false};default:return state;}};export default CartReducer;
